articles.title: Sargeant reflects on breakthrough F1 point in Austin after Leclerc/Hamilton disqualifications - Formula 1
articles.description: Williams managed to grab their first double-points finish of the year in somewhat unlikely fashion in Austin, with their drivers both benefitting from the double disqualification of Lewis Hamilton and Charles Leclerc to climb into the top 10.
